backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, related components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files including App, CSS, Tailwind config, hooks, storage, and admin panel.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the React app entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React page with navigation, quote form, tracking logic using uppercase IDs, admin panel inclusion, and WhatsApp integration.
frontend/src/components/AdminTrackingPan: Password-gated admin panel allowing CRUD operations on shipments with freeâ€‘form status text and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and caching a backend actor based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for backend query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme CSS variables, dark mode variants, and custom gold utilities for branding.
frontend/src/lib/shipmentsStorage.ts: Provides a localStorage-backed CRUD wrapper for shipment statuses with seeded default data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color variables, typography and animation plugins, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata describing the DFC site plus a client-side shipment tracking system with admin and public pages.
